articles.description: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery closes in on the promised land of the Champions League as fan Tom Hanks hopes for a Hollywood finale.
articles.title: Aston Villa 3-3 Liverpool: 'Emery the star of the show as Villa can taste dream finale'

articles.description: Elite sprinting is dominated by black athletes. Theories as to why span painful history and cutting-edge science - and many are unproven.
articles.title: Race and sprinting: What is behind Olympic podium race divide?

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou will "never understand" any Tottenham fans wanting their own team to lose even if it helps deny Arsenal the Premier League title.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham boss will 'never understand' Spurs fans who want to lose to deny Arsenal title

articles.description: Ice hockey player Victor Bjorkung speaks to BBC Sport about the pain of losing Nottingham Panthers team-mate Adam Johnson.
articles.title: Adam Johnson death: Team-mate Victor Bjorkung still gets 'flashbacks'

articles.description: Tyson Fury's father John is injured in a fracas with members of Oleksandr Usyk’s camp as the build-up to Saturday’s world heavyweight contest begins.
articles.title: John Fury injured in fracas with Oleksandr Usyk's camp

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says money is not the only reason for his side's success as they seek to win a fourth Premier League title in a row.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola says money not the reason for club's success

articles.description: Rob Key says English cricket will "have to do without Jimmy Anderson" after the fast bowler calls time on his legendary career against West Indies at Lord's in July.
articles.title: James Anderson: Rob Key says English cricket 'will have to do without' legendary pace bowler

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Saliba, Foden, Palmer, Olise, Eze

articles.description: No-one could have envisaged that 10 years on from his US PGA Championship win at Valhalla we have not seen Rory McIlroy add to his major tally, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy's US PGA Championship tilt at Valhalla buoyed by Quail Hollow victory

articles.description: Arsenal are eyeing a move for Barcelona forward Mariona Caldentey when her contract expires at the end of the season.
articles.title: Mariona Caldentey: Arsenal eyeing move for Barcelona forward
